room_title: Escape room "Missing Maestro" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: Had a great time tonight! We did the Missing Maestro. Loved it! They also have a great a great staff. This is the 3rd escape room I've done in Indy and by far it was the best!

room_title: Escape room "Missing Maestro" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: We did the Missing Maestro for our first escape room experience! It was great and Kirby, our game master, was amazing! Thanks for the wonderful experience!

room_title: Escape room "Missing Maestro" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: Absolutely loved it!!! Clever puzzles, great sets with lots of attention to detail. Did the Missing Maestro and The Cabin with a group of friends and family - we didn't quite make it out on time but really enjoyed the experience. The staff is friendly and their timing of hints is perfect. They won't let you get frustrated or stuck, which makes it super fun. This was definitely the most fun I've had in a long time!

room_title: Escape room "Missing Maestro" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: We did our first escape room tonight and didn't know what to expect. We did the Missing Maestro and it was a lot of fun. You really had to work together and it was cool to see the clues fit together. The enthusiasm that the staff showed really made it a fun time. This is a family owned business and you can tell that it matters to them.
